verses.roman:
se vaiṣṇavera pada-reṇu, tāra pada-chāyā
adhamere dila prabhu-nityānanda-dayā

synonyms: se vaiṣṇavera—of all those Vaiṣṇavas; pada-reṇu—the dust of the feet; tāra—their; pada-chāyā—the shade of the feet; adhamere—unto this fallen soul; dila—gave; prabhu-nityānanda-dayā—the mercy of Lord Nityānanda Prabhu.
translation: The dust and shade of the lotus feet of the Vaiṣṇavas have been granted to this fallen soul by the mercy of Lord Nityānanda.
